body:
Challenge Title:  OVER LEVEL 9000 KILLSTREAK!!!!!!!
Challenge Difficulty: Medium
Possibility of success: 3%
Rules:
  • Kill 101 Players without dying!
  • Using the standard Warrior kit! (Donors: NO PYRO!)
  • Play on a Decently small map!
  • Recording? Yes, If you can, record the gameplay, then Edit out all the boring parts, Use only kills AND your deaths so we can make sure you are not lying! Then Upload to a SAFE website such as Youtube.
  • Other kits: Barbarian, Scout, And Archer! (Nothing else)
Good luck!
A simple challenge, Has its complexities ~kobetexas

title: Avicus Challenges (Day 16) [Nexus]

replies.body: I'll attempt any Nebula challenges, but I'm god-awful at Nexus xP
